EmailTemplate.name: CRM Case Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Your CRMRequest email has been received. Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can see your case here: {!Case.Link}
We strive to respond to your request and begin to address it with you within five days of receiving it. If you do not receive a response in that time, please follow up with your team's Salesforce lead.
Thank you,
Client Salesforce Team
